org.megatome.frame2.errors
Interface Error

public interface Error

Models an error. The model consists of a key (which identifies the source of the error, and may be a resource key), and up to three object values that represent the data in error.

Field Summary
static String MISSING_KEY
          This key is used if an error is created with a null key.
 
Method Summary
 String getKey()
          Get the key for this error.
 String getMessage(Locale locale)
          Create a message from the error.
 Object getValue()
          Return the first value (this is an alias for getValue1).
 Object getValue1()
          Return the first value.
 Object getValue2()
          Return the second value.
 Object getValue3()
          Return the third value.
 List<Object> getValueList()
          Return a list of the values.
 Object[] getValues()
          Get all values for this error object as an array.
 int numValues()
          Return the number of non-null values.
 

Field Detail

MISSING_KEY

static final String MISSING_KEY
This key is used if an error is created with a null key.

Method Detail

getKey

String getKey()
Get the key for this error.

Returns:
The key associated with this error.

getValueList

List<Object> getValueList()
Return a list of the values.

Returns:
All values associated with this error in a list.

getValues

Object[] getValues()
Get all values for this error object as an array.

Returns:
Array containing value objects. May be empty, but will not be null.

Return the first value (this is an alias for getValue1).

Returns:
The first value. May be null.

numValues

int numValues()
Return the number of non-null values.

Returns:
Count of non-null values.

getMessage

String getMessage(Locale locale)
Create a message from the error.

Parameters:
locale - The locale to create the error message for.
Returns:
The constructed error message, with the values substituted in appropriate spots.
